definition: in no way/not in the least/absolutely not
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means

sentences.english: They never allowed the government to develop trains.
sentences.chinese: 它們絕不允許政府開發鐵路。

sentences.english: Keeping our military and using them when we have to, but not as our first instrument.
sentences.chinese: 保存軍事力量，不到非不得已絕不輕易動武。

sentences.english: I'd never leave you until I die.
We're not gonna let him bring shame on our team.
sentences.chinese: 我們絕不會讓他給我們隊臉上抹黑。

sentences.english: Soft but safe Yin Shi Zu, never mind to break up with him.
sentences.chinese: 石柔只求尹祖平安無恙，絕不介意與他分手。

sentences.english: Human beings cannot do without something to look forward to.
sentences.chinese: 人，是絕不能沒有盼頭的。

sentences.english: But I would not give up for anything.
sentences.chinese: 我絕不會爲任何事情放棄。

sentences.english: It is certainly much more than mere background music.
sentences.chinese: 爵士樂絕不僅僅只是背景音樂。

sentences.english: The law does not discriminate against the poor in favour of the rich.
sentences.chinese: 法律絕不歧視窮人而偏袒富人。

sentences.english: "If you never condemned, you would never need to forgive".
sentences.chinese: 如果你從不譴責，你就絕不需要寬恕。

sentences.english: I walk slowly, but I never walk back.
sentences.chinese: 也許走得慢點兒，可我絕不會走回頭路。

sentences.english: The hundred knights were all men of choice behaviour and sobriety of manners .
sentences.chinese: 那一百名武士都是品行端正，絕不胡作非爲的。

sentences.english: Refugees have been deprived of their homes, but they must not be deprived of their futures.
sentences.chinese: 難民的家園已被剝奪，絕不能讓他們的未來也被剝奪。

sentences.english: But I'm not gonna beg, so baby, come around to me.
sentences.chinese: 但我絕不會乞求，所以寶貝，帶着愛快到我身旁。

sentences.english: But she had come this far, she wasn't going to back out now.
sentences.chinese: 不過既然大老遠跑來，絕不會此刻罷手。

sentences.english: The mission was by no means a slam dunk.
sentences.chinese: 這次任務絕不像一次灌籃。

definition: improbable/unlikely/will not (act, happen etc)/not able/not having learned to do sth/(coll.) (Tw) don't mention it/not at all
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
always/at all times/never (if used in negative sentence)
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
